welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Basford, a charming city known for its rich history and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy our unique blend of culture, cuisine, and stunning landscapes. We hope you have a memorable stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport offers a variety of shops, restaurants, and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at East Midlands Airport handles a large volume of air freight and provides efficient logistics services.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password or registration.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password from the information desk.
